content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":10874,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/37991032-21b4-46f0-96b4-206ada7e1b33/QE_onboarding_23 (1).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/37991032-21b4-46f0-96b4-206ada7e1b33/QE_onboarding_23 (1).png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_23 (1).png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_23 (1).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"37991032-21b4-46f0-96b4-206ada7e1b33\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":561,\"height\":155},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Right now, reading this module, you are most likely on the bench.  \\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is that? \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bench\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a period when you work but do not have sufficient project workload (less than 50% of the employee's available time). For example, when a project needs 0-20 hours a week out of 40 hours available. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For obvious reasons, the company tries to minimize the time employees spend on the bench, but since this is an inevitable part of the job, it is better to understand what you can do while on the bench.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What can I do? \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Join Crowd testing\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCTSTIO/test+IO+Handbook+for+Testers\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Crowd testing\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - testing by a community of different testers from different places (Crowd). While on a bench, participating in Crowd Tests is a priority and a good chance to improve your skills; \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prepare for your next project\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Part of the standard project selection process are project interviews. Take time to prepare for the interview with customer: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Update your CV (UPSA profile).\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" A full description of your experience in the Past Projects tab will provide sufficient insight when considering you for a particular position. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMBDSKCV/UPSA+Profile+Update+Guideline+for+Employees\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" you can find detailed instructions on how to approach completing your UPSA profile, as well as \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMGIM/CV+and+UPSA+profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"good CV examples\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prepare for the customer interview.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  Think how to talk about your experience, capabilities, skills, and specific technologies. Having prepared appropriately, it will be much easier for you to go through all the stages of the interviews, and it will also allow you to feel much more. We recommend watching \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=316e94a2-11f2-41ef-8036-ca2c87b6ee9a\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project interviews in English training\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  or a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/BJveDvYR\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"video\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for self-study. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Navigate Level Up and improve your skills\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bench is a great opportunity to freshen up your existing knowledge and learn something new. What exactly to study is up to you based on your preferences in technology, direction, or personal development plan. If you aren’t sure what to take on, then you can always go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://levelup.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LevelUp\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and find something you like or consult with your Resource Manager \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contribute\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If it looks like your bench time is going to last longer than expected, you can enter \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRMKB/Make+it+possible+with+EPAM+Extra+Mile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Contribution Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and support EPAM Communities, mentoring programs and other initiatives.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who can help? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Almost everyone spends time on the bench, at some point it is a normal process. You can always contact your Resource Manager or People Partner in case of any questions – they will help. Knowing how to make the most of this period will help you not to waste your time and reduce feelings of anxiety and uncertainty. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn
